title: "Machine learning improves remanufacturing"
excerpt: "In the »Desire4Electronics« project, Fraunhofer IPA is working with 10 project partners to advance automated disassembly processes for the remanufacturing of small electrical appliances. The project runs from 2023 to 2025 and addresses United Nations Sustainable Development Goals."
